title: Adax of DE logo
content:
Hi friend

Please help me id the font used for this logo Adax of DE

Thanks

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417142950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adax_4515.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content: ‘Adax’ and the numbers are [Cooper Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417142950/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cooper-black/familytree.html). ‘OF DE.’ is Gill Sans.
